justification: Slight nod to B’s desire for reliability, but it ignores B’s injury aversion by offering an Out RB and overstates playoff schedule benefits. Campbell isn’t clearly the possession-type B prefers, and the rationale doesn’t reference B’s TE surplus or SoS focus meaningfully. The offer is mechanically feasible and somewhat logical (A needs TE; B has TE depth), but acceptance odds seem overstated. Explanation is brief and not evidence-based.
